document_data.caption: Squiddly, age 9, on the docks in Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Squiddly
document_data.mainbody:
'''Squiddly''' was a street urchin from [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Squiddly's my name, and I'll be your guide to Trollskull Alley today, all for the low price of 5 nibs.|Squiddly.}}
document_data.Description: Squiddly had a slender build. He had red skin, a long tail, and the horns common of tieflings. His left eye was covered by a black eye patch.
document_data.Personality: He was impulsive, rarely thinking before acting.
document_data.Possessions: Squiddly wore an eye patch and carried a small [[bow]] and a [[quiver]] with a handful of toy [[arrow]]s.
document_data.Relationships:
[[File:Squiddly_portrait.webp|thumb|right|''A closeup of Squiddly's likeness.'']]
Squiddly was part of the group of street urchins that included his friends [[Nat]] and [[Jenks]]. He communicated with the [[deaf]] Nat using a sign language Nat had invented.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, Squiddly and his friends were unwittingly entangled in the city-wide hunt for the ''[[Stone of Golorr]]'', sometimes innocently helping or hindering the efforts of adventurers in retrieving it.
